Title: Lovers & Leavers
Writer: Katja Kallio (novel), Katja Kallio (screenplay), Aku Louhimies (screenplay)
Actors: Minna Haapkylä, Peter Franzén, Laura Malmivaara, Anna-Leena Härkönen
Plot: This movie is about Iiris Vaara. She turns 30 and meets young director Marko. All dreams come true but does Marko share her dreams?
